Name: Bike Arena
About the game: Welcome to the arena of 2 wheelers. Only true enthusiasts will cross the threshold here. The Bike Arena is a racing game is about competitiveness and creating new records. As a participant, you will compete with other motorcyclists, performing all kinds of stunts with the help of the trampolines that are installed on the route. Pay close attention to the fact that in addition to these tramplings, you can find all kinds of stones that the motorcycle cannot overcome, except to avoid them. Thus, combining the useful with the pleasant, something interesting comes out. Will it be the motorcycle or the driver? In the end, who decides the fate of the champion? Let's see ! Game Features : - 30 levels - Thermometer that checks engine heat - Trampling, obstacles on the route
